Frequently Asked Questions in Marlboro

Do you offer free consultations in Marlboro?

Yes! We provide free in-home consultations throughout Marlboro and nearby Manalapan. Our design experts will visit your home to discuss your project, take measurements, and provide a detailed quote.

How long have you been serving Marlboro?

Custom Kitchens & Baths by Lopez has been serving Marlboro and all of Monmouth Countyfor over 20 years. We've completed hundreds of kitchen and bathroom renovations in the area.

Are you familiar with Marlboro building codes?

Absolutely. Our team is well-versed in all local building codes and permit requirements for Marlboro and Monmouth County. We handle all permit applications and coordinate inspections to ensure your project meets all regulations.

What areas near Marlboro do you service?

In addition to Marlboro, we serve all nearby communities includingManalapan, Freehold, Colts Neck, Old Bridge. Our service area covers a 50-mile radius, ensuring we can respond quickly to your needs.

Can you provide references from Marlboro homeowners?

Of course! We're happy to provide references from satisfied customers in Marlboro and surrounding areas. Many of our clients are happy to share their remodeling experience and show off their beautiful new kitchens and bathrooms.
